resources.string: Unfortunately an error occurred while opening the file!
Unfortunately an error occurred while reading the file!
Are you sure you want to replace all these records?

This app is designed based on the "Hedonist" philosophy! It's used to calculate the amount of pleasure and pain one senses in their life.

You can enter the quality of your life in a scale between -3 to +3 for each day.

Alternatively you can estimate the number of a whole month using the field right to the year field at the top of the page.

Then you can see how much pleasure and pain you've sensed overall in your life.

Hold a day button a bit longer to view that day in the calendar of your device.
Notifies you when you everyday to record your well-being status.
